about_the_game:
DEMO



This Demo Version has limited features compared to the original game. The demo only offers Singleplayer, and therefore, Multiplayer is not possible. There are 3 Match to choose from, and there are 3 Maps to select. In this Demo version, it is only possible to play 10 Match at a time, after which you need to wait for 15 minutes for it to reset. You can also restart the game if you wish to avoid waiting for 15 minutes. Read below to find out more about what the Demo has to offer.

Step into the heart-pounding realm of non-stop action with our dynamic shooting game, meticulously crafted and continually evolving to deliver an unparalleled gaming experience. Immerse yourself in the thrill of a game that is refined and enhanced every day, ensuring each playthrough is an adrenaline-fueled journey of excitement and intensity.

Our commitment to excellence drives us to push the boundaries of gaming, constantly introducing new challenges, features, and optimizations. Brace yourself for an ever-improving adventure, where every shot fired, every move made, and every strategy employed contributes to an evolving masterpiece of interactive entertainment.

Engage in an immersive world where skill, strategy, and reflexes collide in a symphony of high-octane action. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the world of virtual combat, our shooting game promises an exhilarating experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Join our community of intense shooter action game enthusiasts and witness firsthand the dynamic evolution of a game that refuses to settle for anything less than excellence. Are you ready to embark on a thrilling journey where each day brings new challenges and triumphs? The battlefield awaits, and the action is just getting started. Dive into the excitement – this is gaming at its finest.

Hit your enemies with your weapons, and blood splashes will spawn on the floor and walls! The blood splash generates from the angle you are shooting them. Try it out and make some blood!


  • Stunning Graphics: Experience outstanding graphic quality that immerses you in the visual beauty of the game.
  • Lots of Action. The Demo is full of Action like the original game, a shooter where you fight for your team and your teammates.
  • Play 3 Match in this Demo. Conquest, DogTag, Bomb.
  • Singleplayer. Play solo with AI Bots, showcasing the same intelligence as real people. The original Game has Multiplayer as well.
  • Different weapons. Choose from Rifles, Machineguns, Pistols, and Knives.
  • 3 Maps in this Demo. Play your Match in 3 different Maps as you wish.
  • Own Medals, Achievements, and Player Level. Collect Medals and Achievements through gameplay, reflecting on your Player profile. The more actively you play and support your team, the higher your Level will be.
  • Competitive Ranking System. Challenge yourself and other players with a competitive ranking system that rewards skill and performance.
  • Food and Water. Find sustenance to survive, avoiding death from hunger and thirst.

MT Games Interactive Team

content_descriptors.notes: The game features intense battles with realistic blood splatter, character injuries, situations involving death, suicide due to lack of food or water, and falls from high points, which may have an emotional impact on some individuals. It is designed for a mature audience and is recommended for adults or young players in the company of an adult. We encourage players to be aware that the game may contain graphic elements that could be disturbing for certain sensitive gamers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 7 3700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Harddrive & Dolby Atmos equipment/software us recommened
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K or AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 3070 8 GB or AMD RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Harddrive & Dolby Atmos equipment/software us recommened
